ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews the Olympic Training King; The Bad News Bores; The Fonz Throughout History; Cracked Guide to Surfing; Celebrities' Home Movies; One Day in Metropolitis; Cracked's Guide to Burglary Prevention; A Cracked History of the Bionic Man; The American Revolution As Seen Through British Eyes; Leverne & Shirly
ComicInfo.Summary: Crackedman tries to change into his costume inside a telephone booth but is arrested for indecent exposure.
